This is a small suggestion. On the antenna, you can see the battery charge and the current status, transmitting/done.

On some of my smaller probes with low battery and a single solar panel, transmitting takes a while so I get to watch the thing recharging for a tiny burst of info and then repeat.

What I'd like to see: Data remaining 13/48 Mits

So that I can get an idea of how long it's going to take.

The total should include all instruments in the current transmit batch.

I'd rather have the transmission stop when out of power, so that I can resume it at later time, after recharging the batteries. And no loss - I finish the whole transmission, I get full credit for it.
